column5: One of my favorite radio programs, Vinyl Cafe, features an interview with the fella that went over the falls and survived. The program airs at 12:00 noon after the news.  Sirius sat. radio ch. #137  For frequencies check here. http://www.cbc.ca/frequency/
I read about that yesterday here......  http://www.thespec.com/News/Local/article/801065  Oddly enough I had no prior knowledge of this.

I remember it, my family was at " Stricker's " cottages on Lovesick Lake near Burleigh Falls at the time, we were there with my aunt and uncle for a week, would have been 10 at the time. It was pretty unbelieveable at the time and still is, just a lifejacket.
I download the podcasts, better than music, sometimes, on long drives.
